text:
Entrance to the view point Puaka Hill. You can park your bicycle here and have a rest too.
There are moneys around this place so be aware about your bags, food and water bottles if you have with you.

A must visit for those who desire to do some trekking on Pulau Ubin.
This hill stands at 74 meters and offers a good vantage point of what used to be a quarry. On a clear morning, you can see the northeastern part of Singapore and parts of Johore. Good hiking shoes are recommended, as it can get slippery on a wet day. And there is definitely no way to cycle up this path.
Puaka hill hut to on top of the Puaka hill i think have around 600m . This distance canâ€™t go by the bicycle,you have to park the bicycle and walk to on top the hill.
Entrance to the view point, can just park your bicycle here
Love the View, difficult to go up to this point.
